message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $150 is a bit high for you, but I'm not willing to go down to $120 just yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $135. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I understand that $125 is still a bit of a stretch for you, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $130. This is my final offer, so I hope you can see the value in the product and meet me at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with $130. I'm willing to pay $125, and that's my final offer. I think it's a fair price considering the value of the product and the price John is willing to sell it to me for
